name: Streemerz
description: Try climbing to the top of this one by throwing steamers and climbing them. On your way up you better watch out for the various pie throwing clowns, burning candles and bouncing balls, because if they get you you'll die a little each time.

name: Spread Fire
description: A game featured in Action 52. You may have some great weapons, in fact the best. You will need them to fight off the tremendous enemies that seem to multiply.

name: Bubble Gum Rosie
description: Rosie is looking for her gum, but so are a lot of other gum-starved critters. Help her get her gum back but be careful the critters don't get you first.

name: Micro Mike
description: He's only the size of a flea, and it's difficult getting from here to their when your smaller than a strand of hair. It seems like your in the land of the giants.

name: Underground
description: A game featured in Action 52. Tunnel this way and that in order to find the gold. Be careful of the other strange creatures.

name: Rocket Jockey
description: Futuristic cowboy straddles a rocket attempting to lasso various robo-cattle. The lasso gains power as it glowa brighter, but gets dimmer and losses power as the bad guys shoot and hit.

name: Non Human
description: A game featured in Action 52. They're not human. They have a mind of their own. They are hungry and they want you as their next meal. Get them before they get you.

name: Cry Baby
description: A game featured in Action 52. Try to get cry baby back to his crib, but be careful to avoid open electric sockets, poisons, and fire in the stove. There are things to help along the way such as cookies, lollipops, candy bars and pacifiers. If the baby meets any bad guys trying to kidnap him, he squeezes the bottle and shoots them.

name: Slashers
description: A game featured in Action 52. They are everywhere. Mean guys with nails that are nine inch knives and they like to slash everything that comes into there path. Don't get in their way or you're the next victim.

name: Crazy Shuffle
description: A game featured in Action 52. Educational puzzle game. Picture matching with many levels games and options. Tests memory and concentration skills.

name: Fuzz Power
description: A game featured in Action 52. Fuzzy must get to the land of Guru. He's got to avoid the walking brushes hair dryers, combs and other natural hair disasters, because if he losses all of his hair he's bald and the game is over.

name: Billy-Bob
description:
Billy Bob is the fortieth game of the NES version of Action 52.

In the game player control Billy Bob. The goal of the game is to complete levels by dodging arrows, jumping over pits and climbing ledges. In the game, you can shoot by pressing the A button. Climbing the ledges, the player needs to guess the moment, as spears and bricks randomly fall from the ceiling.

name: Dedant
description:
Dedant is the fourty sixth game of the NES version of Action 52.

You're a pink ant who has to kill other ants. But in the later levels, if a spider gets down where you are, you're pretty much screwed. The game has six levels. With each level, more types of enemies appear.

name: Robbie and the Robots
description:
Robbie Robot is the fifty first game of the NES version of Action 52.

You play as Robbie as you are shooting other robots with guns or finger missiles and try not to have the enemies shoot you, because if they do, you die.

At the first level, the player can just constantly go straight ahead, constantly shooting. But at the next levels, gaps appear, so the passage becomes much more difficult.

name: Mass Effect 2
description: A remaster of the original Mass Effect 2 included in the Mass Effect: Legendary Edition bundle.

name: Alfredo
description: You play as Alfredo and you need to catch some of the things coming out of the big jar, and some of them are enemies and if they touch you, you die.

name: Cheetahmen
description: Unlike the NES version of Cheetahmen. The Sega Genesis one instead has the same background on all levels, and you need to collect Cheetah Icons from trees or ground areas, and battle snakes, bats, white rhino, hyena, scavenger, and more creatures as you try to get the Cheetah Icons. In level 1 you play as Hercules, then Apollo in level 2, and finally Aries in level 3. Finally, after those 3 levels, the game is beaten.

name: Alien Attack
description: The 17th Title included in Action 32 for Mega Drive/Genesis. A belt-scrolling shooter in which the player must proceed to the right, while defeating the aliens who are trying to take the world.

name: Gotoubun: RE
description: Fangame from the acclaimed manga and anime series The Quintessential Quintuplets.

name: Dauntless
description: Dauntless was one of the many games bundled in Action 52, an unlicensed multicart video game compilation developed by Active Enterprises.

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - Victorian Starter Pack
description:
This DLC includes the following items:

500 Manghirs
The Consulting Detective Outfit
Victorian Vampire Outfit
Vampire's Pallor
'Lead Zeppelin' Quest

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - Detective Pack
description:
This DLC includes the following items:

Master Sleuth Outfit
The Greatest Detective Outfit
Ukrainian Jon Outfit

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - Plague Doctor Pack
description:
This DLC includes the following items:

Plague Doctor Costume
Laboratory Coat

name: Dead Space Demake
description: Dead Space Demake has everything you want and more, from necromorph limb dismemberment to affine texture mapping errors. You've played Dead Space (2008) and you've played Dead Space (2023) it's time to soak in the horrid vibes of Dead Space (1998)

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - Clergyman Cassock
description:
This DLC includes the following items:

Clergyman Cassock

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened - The Sleuth's Attire
description:
Get ready to immerse yourself even deeper and channel your inner detective with three new Victorian-era-inspired costumes!

With the Clergyman Cassock, you'll give the impression of a true man of the cloth, ready to absolve even the most hardened sinners.

Unleash your inner detective with the Master Sleuth costume. This sleek and sophisticated outfit will make you the talk of the town, and give your character the mystery and intrigue of a true virtuoso investigator, ready to solve even the most challenging of mysteries.

The Consulting Detective outfit adds a classic touch to your look and elevates your immersive experience.

name: Entropy: Zero - Uprising
description: Entropy: Zero - Uprising is a mod for Half-Life 2: Episode Two that lets you play as a Civil Protection Unit during the Uprising. The mod features a full campaign of 20 maps, a unique storyline, new enemies and weapons, a fully voiced cast of characters, and a soundtrack composed by various artists.

name: Special Forces Group
description: Special Forces Group is a first person shooter for Android.

name: Seduce a SuicideGirl
description: Meet the sexy Zoli Suicide in a comic book shop and if you make the right choices you will get a sexy, 17+ make-out session with her. Make the wrong choices and get shot down by a SuicideGirl in 10 different humiliating ways.

name: Family Farm: Goodfolks
description:
Family Farm: Goodfolks is an easy to play realistic-looking simulation of country life. Will you accept the challenge of bringing a desolate village back to life?
Good folks are coming to this village looking for a nice place to live and work. You will build fields, orchards, and corrals for livestock. Cook meals with ingredients you harvested, milked, or caught.

name: Ispherical
description:
Do you like Magic, Wizards and Fairies? Help the little Wizard guiding his Sphere through the levels by making and breaking blocks.
Tailor the environment to your needs and build a safe passage for the Sphere to the exit.
But watch out - the evil is always there and everywhere!

name: The Quest: Mithril Horde II
description: The Quest - Mithril Horde II is an expansion to The Quest, a beautifully hand-drawn open world role playing game with old school grid-based movement and turn based combat.

name: World Zombies Cup
description: Have you got the football or soccer fever? Crazy things are going down in the world football or soccer cup series. Play for your favorite team and infect all the players in this funny parody game. Be responsible for a mass zombie invasion but watch out for the vigilant referees. A funny sport zombie game with a viral twist.

name: Champion Cup Goal
description:
Do you want your national football team be the winner of the world champion cup?
Play this fantastic football game, choose your team and your rival, dribble, dodge the opposing players and score the maximum of goals. Raise your team to the top of the ranking and sink your rival to hell by subtracting goals.
Don't miss the opportunity to play in this world tournament your own world league and score goals for your team. This is no normal scorers league… Dare with your favorite sport and rise the ranking of your team to the top of the world.

name: Dodgeout+
description: A videogame inspired by breakout, but now you dodge the projectiles that you shoot.

name: Bouncy Ball
description: Navigate a ball to collect stars while avoiding various obstacles and traps. With over 800 levels spread across more than 20 worlds, the game features a unique map editor and an online map store, allowing players to create and share their own levels. Bouncy Ball is a mobile game that has captivated over 10 million users worldwide, ranking as the second overall free app and the second top brain and puzzle game in South Korea.

name: Burger Please!
description:
Welcome to Burger Please!, the ultimate burger shop simulation game!
Dive into the world of fast-food madness and cook & build your own deluxe burger empire.

Immerse yourself in the world of restaurant business with this simulator game, where you'll not only handle hamburgers but all aspects of the fast food industry. From opening the store, cooking burgers, upgrading your drive-thru counter, to expanding and even opening a new branch – experience it all in the dynamic burger shop business.

name: Another Dungeon
description:
As a young man of the Kabi, Dokebi has the lost power of his tribe.
Explore the vast continent with lots of friends and enjoy the dynamic journey!
Discover the lost power of the Kabi in Another Dungeon!

name: Rizline
description:
Presenting Pigeon Games' second enchanting music rhythm game, following the success of "Phigros"!
Dive into a mesmerizing journey where points and lines dance in harmony, weaving an extraordinary geometric tapestry set to the innermost beat of your heart!

name: Dreamer Adventure
description: An adventure platformer created with pulp for dreamers !

name: Link! Like! Love Live!
description: Link! Like! Love Live! is the mobile app name of Project Love Live! Hasunosora Girls' High School Idol Club.

name: Reincarnated
description: This was a fanmade project and video based on "Garten of Banban" by the Euphoric Brothers. This project was made purely for practice and fun and is not for profit. Please support the official releases of the Garten of Banban series.

name: Anno Mitsumasa Pepperon-mura no Shiki
description: Based on Mitsumasa Anno's picture books, the game takes place in an old-fashioned German village. There are some some city building simulation and management elements, throughout four seasons. Each building has its own activities and learning material such as the bakery, carpenter and clothes shop. There is also a segment in which you can custom build your own village.

name: Bakushou!! All Yoshimoto Quiz-Ou Ketteisen
description: Taking on the theme of the popular Japanese TV quiz show of the popular "Yoshimoto Club", the player participates in a quiz game with multiple choice answers, the goal being to earn as many points as possible to win a prize.

name: Battery Navi
description: The content of the game is made up of information revolving products by the Furukawa Battery Co., Ltd. After brief reading, the player has to play quizzes as multiple choice questions.

name: Bodyconscious Digital Rave! Part 1: Shinjuku & Takashi
description: Bodyconscious Digital Rave! Part 1: Shinjuku & Takashi simulates the nightlife of Japan by taking you to the club scene where you can engage in simulated partying.

name: Chiki-chiki Machine Mou Race: Kenken to Black Maou no Ijiwaru Daisakusen
description: Based on the classic Wacky Races cartoon, this game puts players in the role not of a racer but of a gambler. Players choose different races and gamble on the outcome. Players can pick two different drivers they expect to come out on top. The racing itself is presented via prerendered CG cutscenes with some branching, so players' guesses aren't purely a matter of memorizing the cutscenes. With the money players earn, they can take part in the "trip" mode where they travel through the world of Wacky Races collecting items.

name: Alien
description: Alien is a 1984 strategy/adventure game developed by Concept Software and published by Argus Press Software. It was released in 1984 for the Commodore 64 and ZX Spectrum, and later ported to the Amstrad CPC in 1985.

name: Dennis Miller: That's Geek to Me
description: Multimedia CD-ROM glossary of computer-related terms ("ASCII", "E-mail", "Cross-platform" etc.) with both a serious explanation spoken by an animated "geek" character, and digitized video clips of Dennis Miller giving his own humorous definition of the same term.

name: Multimedia Shinsho: Driving School - Futsu Menkyoka-hen
description: This program is made to teach the player how to drive and to test them on the dos and don'ts of driving. This comes in the form of true or false questions in a limited time either during a simulated drive or during a driving school examination. Correct answers grant the player points on their driving license, while incorrect answers lose points and/or health in the case of the simulated drive.

name: Machine Yearning
description: You are a robot applying for a job. The poster of the job wants to keep humans from applying. To do this, they have prepared a captcha system with a new captcha every 10 seconds that only robots should be able to solve. Can you keep track of the language you’re building, or will your tiny human brain collapse under its own weight?

name: Digital Bojangles Saga HD Remaster
description: Digital Bojangles Saga is a fan-made Shin Megami Tensei fangame that seeks to combine the fast-paced gameplay of mainline Megami Tensei with an unconventional story to deliver a unique experience.

name: Disco Dave
description: Say hello to neon lights and funky moves! The disco fever begins with Disco Dave on the ever changing dance floor!

name: 3D Chess Black and White
description:
Try to beat the smart phone that knows a lot of different strategies. You'll be surprised at its ability! Do not give up, because only the most intelligent can beat it!
User-friendly interface and graphics to help you focus on your game. Even if you make a mistake in your move, you will have the opportunity to correct it, it's just a game! Observe the rules, choose a strategy and the victory will be yours!

name: Blender Express HD
description: Choose from gorgeous retina display themes, where you’ll have to catch falling fruit with your specialized blender to create the perfect smoothie. Watch out for the rotten/poisoned fruit! Blender express offers hours of addictive gameplay through 100 different levels ( and more coming soon ! ) to keep the whole family fully entertained and satisfied. Catch the right fruit, earn 3 stars and bring the fun into your home kitchen with a real life recipe at your fingertips.

name: Apocalypse Traffic
description:
The year is 2030. A human pandemic has swept the Earth leaving only a few survivors. The world's cities are now run by nature; barren land resides where communities once thrived. Buckle up, it’s time to fight for survival through the Apocalypse Traffic.
Drive your way through three decimated locations whilst avoiding traffic to increase money; High-octane driving is rewarded with near miss and high-speed bonuses. Witness the new world through three locations - a decaying city, desolate badlands and a town left in ruins.
After dodging traffic, spend your coins on upgrading the car’s brakes, steering and acceleration. Once the money rolls in, upgrade your car from one of the seven available. Each has their own unique style and characteristics.

name: Infinite Roads
description: Drift and jump across an infinite multitude of roads. Infinite Roads is a simple but hard to master arcade racer. Can you keep your car inside the road and beat the high-score?

name: Tippy Train
description: Drive the runaway train as far as you can! Lose all the cargo and the train explodes! Reach the reload stations to reload cargo and extend your run! Unlock the truck - holds more cargo but is more unstable!

name: War of Thrones: Dragons Story
description: You can summon your Dragon and let it be the Guard of your kingdoms.

name: Open the Door: A Short Story About Life
description:
It is a story of a small journey that doesn't take that long. Please pick it up and try to open the "door".
In "A Short Game of Opening Doors," you walk through a fantastic world and collect "Money" and "Delight" to open doors and move forward. The game is a 3D adventure game in which you walk through a slightly fantastical world, collect "Money" and "Delight", and try to open the door and move on. Don't worry, there are no difficult actions, ferocious monsters, or overly complicated puzzles. If you walk, the story will move forward as much as you walk.

name: Trail Master 3D
description: Turn the trails as smooth as possible to keep the ball fast. Be aware of holes and get the diamonds on your way. Enjoy the music, but beware of the time left. Get the cup at for each level.

name: Nightshade Ninja Warrior
description: Nightshade Ninja Warrior is an action-packed game that combines elements of adventure, combat, and stealth. Players take on the role of a skilled ninja, who must traverse a dangerous landscape filled with enemies, obstacles, and treacherous terrain. As players progress through the game, they will encounter various enemies, each with their unique strengths and weaknesses. Combat sequences are fast-paced and intense, with players using a variety of abilities to defeat their foes. The game also features challenging boss fights, where players must utilize their skills and strategy to emerge victorious.

name: Mystic Warriors Battleground
description: Mystic Warriors Battleground is an exciting fighting game where players take on the role of a skilled warrior who must battle through challenging levels to defeat their enemies. Along the way, players will develop their abilities and skills, allowing them to customize their fighter to suit their playstyle.

name: Luckie Ball
description: Luckie Ball is a short precision platformer where nothing is fully solid. You'll float to the top of everything! Features tight controls, a custom physics engine, tons of bonus content, and a level editor.

name: Akka Arrh: Special Edition
description:
Special Edition Includes:

Butcher Bill’s Sticker Sheet
2x Arcade Cabinet Papercrafts

name: Chronicles of 2 Heroes: Amaterasu's Wrath - Collector's Edition
description:
Chronicles of 2 Heroes: Amaterasu's Wrath - Collector's Edition includes:
- Physical copy of the game
- Artbook
- Soundtrack
- Double-sided Poster
- Samurai Pin
- Magatama Necklace
- Stickers Sheet
- Collector's Box

name: Kozmik Krooz'r
description: Kozmik Krooz'r is a shoot 'em up video game developed by Bally Midway and released in arcades in 1982. The spaceship, a core element of the gameplay, is not an in-game graphic, but a physical plastic model. A series of mirrors projects the mothership just above the game's monitor.

name: Super Off Road Track Pack
description: This game is almost exactly the same as the original except that it has eight brand-new tracks which are Shortcut, Cut-off Pass, Pig Bog, Rio Trio, Leapin' Lizards, Redoubt About, Boulder Hill and Volcano Valley.

name: Timeguessr
description:
A game of simulated historical and geographical knowledge. Players must pinpoint the location of a photograph and the year by dropping a location pin on a map and select the year the photograph was taken.

Points are awarded for distance from correct location and year.

name: Poop Collector: Number 2
description:
The poop gods have found out about the disaster you brought upon them in your previous mission and they are furious!

They have located you on earth and took you to a hidden cave somewhere on the planet "Pooparium" and the only way to escape and get back home is to play their game and show them why you are the best poop collector out there!

This time they are making your life harder with obstacles and more challenging rooms so go out there and show them how fast you can shame them and clear their rooms to escape back home!

Feedback is always welcome, enjoy!

name: Quadanoid
description:
A breakout clone with a twist!

There are no walls, only paddles and bricks.
The idea is to use the paddles as walls and clear the level.
Each level brick layout is randomly generated and everytime you clear a level the movement speed increases.

Let's see how far you can get :)

Enjoy!

name: Jamie
description: A secret gets uncovered. Will your journey into that secret uncover your deepest desires ? Follow Jamie, an ordinary shy college student, explore his feminine side and see how his girlfriend Sarah copes with these changes and her own explorations.

name: Atom
description:
Atom is an interesting idle game where you can collect all the known elements from Hydrogen to Oganesson.
In this idle game you will be able to go from Schoolboy to Professor with a worldwide reputation

name: Ballz Deep
description: Ballz Spawn at the top of your screen and fall to the end. There are obstacles in the way and it's up to you to upgrade to make the map easier!

name: Ant Fight
description: Have you watched the battle between ants? Tiny ants seem to be weak, but the united ant army can burst into huge energy! In the ant fight, command an army of ants to win the final victory！

name: The Idle Forces: Army Tycoon
description:
The Idle Forces: Army Tycoon is incremental game. But it isn’t one of the traditional idle city builder games! You won't find here supermarket, restaurant, roller coaster and amusement park because it is an army simulator, rookie!
Do you want to become an idle army commander and command the tycoon military units of a powerful state and execute peacekeeping campaigns? Do you want to raise a recruit to a military specialist? Bring Freedom, Law and Order even to the most remote corners of the planet!

name: Rack and Slay
description: A rogue-like dungeon crawler where you're a billiard ball. Push monster balls into holes or traps in randomly generated levels. Draft stackable items with game-changing effects to build synergies.

name: Die Hard
description: Die Hard is a third-person shooter. The player battles terrorists and rescues hostages in the Nakatomi Plaza, which is the setting of the first film in the series.

name: Die Hard 2: Die Harder
description: Die Hard 2: Die Harder is presented as an on rails-shooter, where the player must stop terrorists who have taken over Dulles Airport from the second film.

name: Die Hard with a Vengeance
description: In Die Hard with a Vengeance, the player goes on a joyride driving a taxicab, sports car, and dump truck throughout all of New York City and is tasked with finding and defusing several explosives before they can go off.

name: Hoops: Shut Up and Jam 2
description: A version of Barkley: Shut Up and Jam 2 without the player's license.

name: Hoops: Shut Up and Jam
description: A version of Barkley: Shut Up and Jam without the player's license.

name: Super Off Road
description: A version of Super Off Road without the Ivan ''Ironman'' Stewart's license.

name: Viruzzerk
description: A game based on Robotron 2084, Berzerk and Windows XP

name: 4 Wheel Drive
description: A version of Jeep Jamboree: Off Road Adventure without the Jeep brand license.

name: Marksman Shooting
description: In Marksman Shooting, you shoot red spots on a several number of targets in order to score points before they disappear. Try to shoot at least ten targets, otherwise your qualification score may be low. If you beat the qualification score, you proceed to the next round. Otherwise, the game ends.

name: Trap Shooting
description: In Trap Shooting, shoot discuses that are thrown into the air. If you miss, then they will fall into the distance. Your gun is reloaded after each go.

name: Stars Shooter
description: A basic arcade video game of spaceships

name: Let’s Build a Zoo: Aquarium Odyssey
description: Escape to a brand new AQUARIUM ISLAND and discover a world of seafaring beasts. Start a brand new zoo complete with adorable water splashing and ocean dwelling creatures, brand new themed shops and a whole host of new decorations to give your guests the ultimate aquatic experience!

name: Freddy's Pizza Parlor Survival
description: Freddy's Pizza Parlor Survival, or FPPS for short, is a tower defense game based off of Scott Cawthon's Five Nights At Freddy's franchise. As you progress through the game, you must place towers, develop strategies, and face an ever-growing army of hungry children.

name: Lemmings 2: The Tribes
description: This port is almost completely identical to the main release. However, the lack of game intro and the greatly reduced quality of sounds with a chiptune soundtrack due to the sound card makes this an overall inferior port.

name: Killer Karaoke: El Juego
description: Killer Karaoke: El Juego is a mobile game based on the American game show of the same name, where you are the host, who decides what kind of insects the contestant must overcome while singing, and your goal is to make them stop singing.

name: X-Men Legends II: Rise of Apocalypse
description:
X-Men Legends II: Rise of Apocalypse is an action role-playing game developed primarily by Raven Software and published by Activision. It is the follow up to 2004's X-Men Legends. It is set after the events of X-Men Legends and features the mutant supervillain Apocalypse as the primary antagonist.

The developers intended the game to have a greater sense of scale than its predecessor, with a story where the villains known as the Brotherhood of Mutants would need to ally themselves with the X-Men to defeat a greater threat.

name: D's Diner: The Director's Cut
description: A director's cut of D including additional cutscenes and trailers including the trailer for D2. The story begins in 1997. It's the dead of night in the city of Los Angeles, and there has been a mass murder at a general hospital on the outskirts of downtown. The perpetrator is the director of the hospital, Richter Harris. He has shut himself up in the hospital and taken a number of patients as hostages, leaving the police helpless and unable to move in. Richter's only daughter, Laura Harris, after hearing the situation, rushes to Los Angeles from San Francisco, and drives alone to the tragic scene at the hospital ground. Upon entering the hospital Laura finds herself transported to an old mansion, while the disembodied voice of her father pleads with her to leave. Nevertheless she must press forward to save her father and herself.

name: Endlessly
description: Endlessly is the story of an endless love that happened on a beach. A love so seamless and so lustful, it appeared to have no beginning and no end. But what an end Nikki had! And what a bod Crystal Wilder had. We're sorry. We digress. Enjoy Endlessly. After all, it won't be around forever.

name: Gateway to English: Eigo de Go!
description:
This game is designed to teach Japanese how to speak English through four different activities. Those activities include:

Typing on an English or Japanese Katakana tutor keyboard to learn words and the objects that pair with them.
Four different domestic locations with objects and their names dictated.
Four categories of puzzles that indicate objects and their relationships.
Four radios with their own topic, which show an object, the name in English and the name in Japanese.

name: Grimm Meisaku Gekijou Vol. 1: Bremen no Ongakutai
description: The game relies heavily on the then new full motion video feature of the 3DO. The game is a compilation of cartoons, all loosely based upon stories made famous by the Brothers Grimm. The animation for the cartoons was done by the famous Nippon Anime Corporation.

name: Grimm Meisaku Gekijou Vol. 2: Hansel to Gretel
description: The game relies heavily on the then new full motion video feature of the 3DO. The game is a compilation of cartoons, all loosely based upon stories made famous by the Brothers Grimm. The animation for the cartoons was done by the famous Nippon Anime Corporation.

name: Grimm Meisaku Gekijou Vol. 3: Akazukin
description: The game relies heavily on the then new full motion video feature of the 3DO. The game is a compilation of cartoons, all loosely based upon stories made famous by the Brothers Grimm. The animation for the cartoons was done by the famous Nippon Anime Corporation.

name: Birds no More
description: No place to relax? No silence in the air? Fidgeting birdies surround? Prove yourself handy-smash noisy birdies! Bright and childish, simple and fun. Easy game for a minute at ease. Have a minute-go for birdies!

name: Cut Off From The World
description:
Survival game on a deserted island full of unexpected events. The player embodies a character who wanted to escape his complicated life. He prepares a plan to run aground on an island that he himself had spotted on a map. Once on this island, the player must learn to survive by fulfilling their needs to drink, eat, rest, and sleep.
He will have to improve his comfort by exploring the island and also face certain events. A man called Ronald will also be stranded on the beach of the island because of a boat accident, it will be necessary to help him and save him from the pirates who are in pursuit. It will also be necessary to find a way to signal the presence of Ronald on the island so that he can return home.

name: Camera Birds
description: Camera Birds is the first free bird watching game for iOS ever. Use your iPhone, iPad, or iTouch to take pictures of birds in a virtual forest. Score points for how good your photos are. Stay on your toes and you might catch a glimpse of a rare bird!

name: Vareion
description:
An authentic and exhilarating hack-and-slash RPG with 8-bit graphics!
Become the legendary magic knight Vareion and defeat the 12 gods!
Enjoy a roguelike experience with randomly generated maps!
A variety of fearsome enemies will come at you!
Equip yourself with various weapons and armor to defeat the oncoming enemies!

name: Backgammon Live
description:
With Backgammon Live, you can play online backgammon on iPad in HD and you can play on iPhone and iPod Touch as well. Internet connection required.
Play internet backgammon games or matches or tournaments, chat, compete, make new friends!

name: Inside Pete Premium
description:
You really can polish a turd. Meet Pete, a confused, burnt-out, middle-aged man beyond help. Get inside of Pete and clean him up, because nobody else wants to do it.
Conquer a colourful range of organisms in this strategic game with real-time action. Find a balance between building units, battle tactics and resource management.
Grow your own power-ups, exchange gathered DNA for upgrades, lots of upgrades, and use Doc's tips and tricks to your advantage. But mostly, crush, kill and destroy with your army of clones.

name: World of Blade: Zombie Slasher
description:
Are you ready to become a blade master? Get started now!
Very simple! but addictive game! World of Blade!
Compete other gladiators around the world!
And you must survive the battle with the zombies!

name: KickUp King
description: KickUp King, is a fun 8bit style kickup game where you try to keep the ball in the air. Try to complete combos and score points while avoiding obstacles.

name: Finger Champion
description:
Play against your friends and family on the same device or solo vs CPU.
Each player chooses one side and a character. Tap as fast as you can, the fastest tapper wins!

name: Medal Bound
description:
Build your own superstar team of athletes from the ground up and guide them to glory with this sports management game.
Scout athletes, find sponsors and customize their training routines to reach peak performance just in time for key events.
Want to raise your odds of finding your next gold medalist? Draft a superstar athlete or hire an assistant coach!
Put your skills to the test to see if you can create a team of world class athletes!
Start out with Track, Cycling and Aquatics.
Purchase additional sports packs including a pack for Martial Arts, Gymnastics and Field, and a pack for Marksmanship, Equestrian, and Watersports.

name: Demons vs. Fairyland
description: Raise undead armies, construct brutally cute towers and summon dark energies to protect your children at all costs. Skills and gears will enhance your powers and structure upgrades with grant special abilities to fight your way back to the dark forest. Those goody two-shoes Fairyland folks aren't going to make it easy...!

name: Words Scramble: Cities
description: A superb combination of guessing the city/place name and unscrambling words will keep you hooked for hours together. Look at the beautiful real life pictures from around the world and guess the words that are a part of that picture. So keep playing till you get them all!

name: Bird Sort: Color Puzzle
description: Bird Sort - Color Puzzle - Sorting puzzle game with a unique art style, a collection of colorful birds.

name: Tower War: Tactical Conquest
description: Turn the tide and win the war in this elegantly simple casual tactics game that's guaranteed to appeal to all armchair commanders and pocket Napoleons.

name: Space Survivor
description: The darkness is coming!! The silence is covering your spaceship step by step! The silent rooms. Some scary things are inside your spaceship… they are haunting you.

name: YARG
description: YARG (a.k.a. Yet Another Rhythm Game) is a free, open-source, plastic guitar game that is still in development. It supports guitar (five fret), drums (plastic or e-kit), vocals, pro-guitar, and more!

name: Idle Bubbles Cannon: Aim & Tap
description: In this shooting game, you will burst millions of bubbles and balls while you upgrade your weapons and match the colors. Get ready to challenge yourself or relax while you watch your cannons do the hard work, it is your choice!

name: Tap to Build
description:
Welcome to Tap to Build, where the title says it all. Tap on the red button, spawn as many crates as you can, grab those materials and merge away!

Level up and unlock new areas of your map, which will also unlock new resources to collect and merge. The more resources you merge, the more advanced they become. It all culminates with a cute little building, complete with a worker to assist you in your quest to build an empire!

name: Stick Fight: Endless Battle
description: Stick Fight: Endless Battle is a game that combines puzzle, action, strategy, tactics.

name: Is This Weapon?
description: Dodge! fighting! upgrade! Every time you level up, you can gain abilities, use various combinations, and survive in the endless stream of monsters!

name: Space Takeover: Over City
description: Conquer the world and strategize all the states io! Towers or states, all will be conquered!

name: Adorimon: Adventure of Monster
description:
Collect and train Adorimon, build a team to fight other monster armies.

This is a classic monster catching game, form your team and fight to win.

A long way ahead to evolve your army. Be the best Adorimon trainer.

name: Survivor Warrior-Vampire.io
description:
Shaklas Continent is a magical world full of fantasy!
Awakened by a magical curse, you must embark on a difficult road to explore the world.
Grab your weapons, cast your spells, and join other survivors to defeat powerful enemies!
Upgrade equipment and talents to expand your own advantages and create your secret recipe for victory
Wandering in survival and exploration, uncover the mysteries of each story.

name: Miners Settlement: Idle RPG
description: Miners Settlement: Idle RPG is a clicker game which will take you on an open-world adventure full of fantastical creatures. Go on a mighty quest to craft equipment, mine for materials and fight enemies in classic RPG battles!

name: Fight For America: Country War
description: Fight for America is a tactical and strategy tower defense game where you must battle your way across the country in a quest for conquest, liberating one state after state io from its enemies and showing your patriotism at its fullest potential.

name: Idle Tap Zoo: Tap, Build & Upg
description: Tap, collect and raise your very own zoo animals in Idle Tap Zoo, the incremental idle zoo clicker game! Raise zoo animals and upgrade them to increase their birth rate and value, then sell them for a profit to expand your business with just a tap! Use your profits to build your own custom zoo!

name: Pocket Farm
description: Welcome to Pocket Farm, the newest addition to the world of farming games that promises an exciting journey. Pocket Farm is a unique farming simulation game with an incremental clicker core, providing simple yet addictive gameplay that engages you deeply to the world of farming simulation.

name: Bud Farm: Munchie Match
description: Match Gummies and Get the Munchies! Join Shorty and friends in matching their way through munchies and fixing up their empty mansion into a far-out hangout pad and marijuana farm!

name: Merge Gangster Heist vs. Police
description: Prepare yourself for an intense Mafia simulation game adventure! Take charge of cunning enterprises, assemble skilled Capos to execute your commands, and seize fresh territories by any means necessary. Exercise your freedom: demand protection fees, carry out robberies, engage in street battles. Embrace either benevolent leadership or ruthless crime lord status. The choice is yours when it comes to whom you steal from and what you pilfer!

name: Idle Ghost Hotel
description:
Welcome to the resting place for cute ghosts!
Develop your haunted hotel with simple taps!
You can progress quickly in this hotel tycoon game.

name: Kitty Cat Resort
description:
Idle Cat-Raising Game

Just the sight of these cats will make you smile!

Hey there, future cat sitters! Do you want to build a resort for cats?

name: Idle Power
description: Your systems have come online. Your programming directs you to generate as much energy as possible, by any means necessary. Spin the gear handles, sell your energy to the grid, and invest money to build up your infrastructure as you expand to ever-increasing heights. The world, and indeed the universe, will find out just what happens when an artificial intelligence is given a single task: Maximize yourself at all costs.

name: 456 Survival Battle
description: Survival Battle, also known as Squid Game, is an intense and thrilling online game that challenges players to compete in a series of survival challenges.

name: Phazer Punk
description: Phazer Punk is a mini metroidvania game where you explore mysterious alien planets full of secrets and dangers. Use your phazer gun to destroy obstacles and your jetpack to reach new heights as you discover new areas and abilities. But be careful, as you go deeper and deeper into the planets core, you will face more challenges and enemies. Can you find all the hidden resources and escape the planets... Phazer Punk?

name: Tales of Sector 1
description: In a world overtaken by a deadly virus, you are a recruit with a crucial mission: to stop the infection from spreading to the lower sectors. But your task is not as simple as it seems. You will face moral dilemmas, unexpected challenges and diverse characters along the way. Your choices will shape the story and the destiny of the town.

name: TurnKee
description:
A pixel art turn-based dungeon crawler where you choose to move one tile every turn.
You are Monkee. You're in some dungeon. There's keys in the rooms. They might be useful. There's enemies. Probably should avoid them...

name: Be A Rock
description: A unique 3rd-person exploration game set in a beautiful open world. Your spirit is born in the form of a rock as you explore canyons, deserts, and volcanic lands in order to uncover secrets of the past. The game features puzzle solving, and a distinct storytelling style. For fans of Journey.

name: Routine Checkup
description: A first-person murder mystery horror game. Explore a creepy dentist's office and try to identify a corpse by collecting the victim's missing teeth.

name: River Song
description: A Kaizo light hack for beginners! The tricks and set ups start very easy but tend to get a bit more difficult further on.

name: Rockman 3: The Last of Mushroom Kingdom?!
description: The world of the Mushroom Kingdom is invaded by Dr. Wily with his army of robots. Mario is not around when Dr. Wily took over the Mushroom Kingdom, so Princess Peach can only depend, this time, on Rockman to stop Dr. Wily from his world domination delusions!

name: Quest On Full Moon Island
description: One day a mysterious black pipe suddenly appeared in the Mushroom Kingdom, in front of the Toadstool Castle. Mario decided to explore inside it, and he was teleported to an unknown island called Full Moon Island. Little did he know that there wasn’t any way back… apparently. Other people were trapped there, so he began to roam around in search of an escape.

name: Melonizard
description: 2D Adventure/Action game where stealth is at the forefront. With 22 separate levels, each one offering a different experience, you'll be asked to be careful and overcome the different obstacles to reach the fruit at the end of each level!

name: Nightshade: Ninja Warrior
description: Get ready to become the ultimate ninja warrior!

name: Elise
description: Elise is a Yume Nikki-like romhack in which you play as Elise, a fresh young adult who, in her despair, wished she could stay eternally asleep. This wish was granted to her and she is now wandering her own subconscious dreamworld. It is up to you to find all the dream drops, discover the story behind her predicament, and wake herself up from her slumber.

name: Landnama
description: Face the judgment of winter’s deadly toll as you lead the first Viking clans to settle Iceland in this non-violent, rogue-lite survival base builder.

name: Fantasy Journey
description:
​Set out on an epic journey in this spectacular 2D anime RPG—welcome to Fantasy Journey: Survival ARPG!

This cute yet feisty action RPG will take you straight to the fantasy world engulfed in chaos and swarming with enemies. But fear not: you’ll sure handle challenges like a boss!

name: Silent Apartment
description: It's nighttime and the dormitory, often rumoured to be haunted by spirits, awaits its other prey.

name: Scary Spider Train Survival 1
description: Get ready for the ultimate Spider Train survival horror experience with Choo Scary Spider Train Survival 1! In this thrilling game, you'll be the conductor of a small yellow train equipped with a map, hunting machine gun, and an impressive collection of Charles-anti weapons also known as cho-cho weapons. But, initially, you won’t access to all the cho-cho weapons: you will have to prove your strength and finish multiple in-game missions in order to acquire more powerful anti-Charles weapons. Your ultimate goal is to eradicate the spider train monsters known as Charles-1X crew who has, with his fellow monsters even more powerful than mr meat or evil nun or huggy, terrorized the cho-cho islands and is preying on the flesh of humans. Get ready for exciting horror playtime!

name: Banana Heroes: Fruit Survivor
description:
While our Banana hero is powerful and capable of learning and using vast majority of weaponry and skills, we needs YOU to guide it through the endless waves of evil zombies to become the ultimate top gunner and save the day.

As our Banana Heroes gains experience through hard fought battles, you decide which weapon it 'll learn and use

Are you a fan of Survival - Top gunner - Pixel Arcade game? Are you a fan of Survivor Games? From a complete basic to the mightiest hero, combine the best skills to destroy zombies and become the last survivor! You can create thousands of unique skill combinations to overcome the challenges and survive every wave of enemies’ attacks.

name: Hamster Escapes: Minnie Pets!
description: Save the hamster family from evil Dr. Hooman!

name: Tomb Color: ASMR Maze Escape
description: Welcome to the new fun Tomb Color - Maze Escape ASMR game with various twists, impressive graphics, and gameplay. This is a new version of Tomb of the Mask Color 2 with new new Skins and Adventure and ASMR Simulation. Test your IQ level by playing maze games and enjoy more challenges with various twists. Maze games are amazing and made for everyone. So you can challenge your brain by finding the path in maze games.

name: Trip To Nonogram: Bali Ubud
description:
A trip to Ubud to get away from the repetitive routine like a treadmill.
When you solve the nonogram puzzle, a unique and beautiful scenery that can only be seen on your travels unfolds.

Enjoy the pleasure of exotic travel destinations now!

name: Legend Of Ghost Slayer Idle
description:
Ghost Slayer, awaken your ghost power!
Awaken the power of ghosts to drive out the rebels and become a true lord!
Play Infinite Farming RPG, Ghost Slayer!

name: Mortician Inc.: Idle Empire
description: Build your own idle empire in Mortician Inc. simulation game. Become a well-known graveyard tycoon with a new clicker game! Funeral idle games give you the chance to grow immortal business from scratch: hire staff, buy furniture, expand your funeral home, offer first-class services to your customers, and work up a reputation of the best mortician in town.

name: Pickle Pete: Survival RPG
description: Darkness has settled over the world, and our hero must find a way to survive against the waves of evil forces. Stack up, gear up, and create countless combinations of unique builds to become stronger than your enemies. Find the antidote and save the world!

name: Idle Mafia: Tycoon Manager
description:
Get ready for a gritty Idle Mafia simulation game experience!
Manage insidious businesses, gather talented Capos to carry out your bidding, and occupy new territory through any means necessary.

name: Rockman 4: Burst Chaser X Air Sliding
description:
Rockman 4 - Burst Chaser X Air Sliding is a romhack that combines two unique concepts from 2 different Rockman hacks. Burst Chaser, where Rockman moves fast with farther jumping distance. And Air Sliding, where Rockman can slide in mid-air.

Rockman 4 BCAS also features new music, level designs & modified enemy & Robot Master AIs, as well as new weapons.

name: Granny Legend
description: Enjoy this simple yet extremely addictive gameplay, packed with an epic music collection and great visual effects. Defeat monsters and their bosses by Spinning your weapons.

name: Roblox 64
description: A low effort meme hack of Super Mario 64 based on Roblox.

name: Wondersnake
description: A homebrew version of Snake developer for the Wonderswan Color.

name: Videocart-27: Pac-Man
description:
An unauthorized version of Pac-Man.

Pac-Man is a game where the eponymous Pac-Man goes around a maze in the cardinal directions munching pellets as he goes. The goal is to eat all the pellets found on the maze. While trying to do this, Pac-Man is harassed by four ghosts (Blinky, Pinky, Inky, and Clyde) who constantly chase him around the maze. If the ghosts touch Pac-Man, he will lose a life. Pac-Man starts with three lives and if he loses all of them the game will end.

Pac-Man is not completely defenseless as on each maze, there are four power pellets, that when Pac-Man consumes them, will cause the tides to turn, as Pac-Man will be able to temporarily chase the ghosts to eat them and temporarily send them back to the middle of the maze from whence they came. Pac-Man can also eat randomly appearing fruit to earn bonus points.

This version of Pac-Man retains the intermissions found in the original game.

developers.name: Kai Darius Kohl and Fredric Blåholtz

name: Hotel Renovator: Kawaii Furniture Set
description: Invite your guests on the most adorable stay with the Kawaii Furniture set.Give your hotel that youthful glow with the Kawaii Furniture set, packed with the cutest 53 items that will make any of your customers' heart melt. With its bright colors and playful patterns, life truly is all sunshine and rainbows!

name: Playable Mockup
description: Explore an infinite loop corridor and get to 0 PM to 0 AM by building a "Time manipulation deck". You will be challenged with a life threatening test. Wander the “Dead Soul Corridor” created from a ghost photo. Find a way to get to the soul of the dead.

name: Thanks, Come Again
description: A game by Incisor Studios for the Cartomancy Anthology. A game about the day-to-day of a simple shopkeeper and their complex wares. Try not to give too much of yourself away.

name: Trine 5: A Clockwork Conspiracy
description:
Trine 5: A Clockwork Conspiracy will take Amadeus the Wizard, Zoya the Thief, and Pontius the Knight on their most action-packed journey yet!

Traverse breathtaking 2.5D landscapes in Trine‘s deepest and visually richest chapter to date, with an all new cast of characters – some friends, some foes, but all unforgettable.

Whether by yourself or playing with up to three friends in online and local co-op, the upgraded puzzle difficulty system keeps things fresh, adapting the challenge to the number of players.

Level up the heroes' abilities with the all-new skill quest system, growing their legend as they are once again united by… the Trine!

name: PacMania II
description:
PacMania II is the fourth game in the Alawar PacMania series based on the original Pac-Man. Like in Pac-Man, all the dots from a board need to be eaten in order to pass to the next board. If the characters bumps into a monster, he loses a life. There are special pills in every stage allowing the character to eat the monsters for a short period of time.

The game contains three game modes: Classic: this is the original style of Pac-Man*, the player is the yellow dot muncher, and the enemies are the four ghosts.

- Advanced: in this type the player's character is a pair of big lips and the enemies are skeletons.
- CarMania: in this type the player is bulldozer and the enemies are little cars. Objects turn into fuel tanks, screwdrivers and hearts. This third mode was added in an updated version.

In every game type there are also bonuses. Most of them offer points and hearts provide extra lives. For every five completed levels a password is provided to continue from there.

name: Spider-Man 3: Vigilante Vengeance
description: Spider-Man 3: Vigilante Vengeance is a handheld game based on Spider-Man.

name: Spider-Man 3: Trio of Terror
description: Spider-Man 3: Trio of Terror is a handheld game based on Spider-Man.

name: Spider-Man 3: The Goblin Strikes!
description: A handheld game based on Spider-Man.

name: Spider-Man 3: High-Rise Hysteria
description: A handheld game based on Spider-Man.

name: Spider-Man 3: Escape the Sandman
description: Spider-Man 3: Escape the Sandman is an LCD handheld game based on Spider-Man.

name: Spider-Man
description: A handheld game based on Spider-Man.

name: Small Soldiers: Hand to Hand Combat Game
Pokéwalker
description:
The Pokéwalker is a pedometer device specifically for use with Pokémon HeartGold and SoulSilver that is able to interact with the games in various manners. It was released in Japan on September 12, 2009 bundled with every copy of Pokémon HeartGold and SoulSilver, and then later released with every localized copy of the games. The accessory has a Poké Ball design with a small monochrome LCD screen and three functioning buttons. The Pokéwalker supports infrared signals allowing players to interact within a short range with a game card of Pokémon HeartGold or SoulSilver while slotted in the Nintendo DS, or with another Pokéwalker.

The system records every time a step is taken, and the daily step count influences which wild Pokémon and items will appear. The player can transfer a Pokémon to the Pokéwalker from either HeartGold or SoulSilver, which gains experience for each step. Like the Pokémon Pikachu and Pokémon Pikachu 2 GS, the Pokéwalker uses a currency known as "Watts" (shortened to w); every 20 steps will earn the player one watt. Players can also catch various Pokémon and obtain items on the device, then transfer them to the game. Alongside the Johto Safari Zone, the Pokéwalker allows for Pokémon normally unavailable until after the player has traveled to Kanto, such as Murkrow, to be available before defeating the Johto League.

Much as HeartGold and SoulSilver are remakes of the original Gold and Silver, the Pokéwalker could be considered to be somewhat of a remake of Pokémon Pikachu 2 GS, which interacted in much the same way with the Generation II games. Unlike Pokémon Pikachu 2 GS, however, Pikachu is not the only Pokémon that can be interacted with, and Pokémon can actually be transferred to and from the Pokéwalker at any given time.

name: Pokémon Advanced: Cyber Poké Ball 2
description: This is the second version of the Cyber Poké Ball, a simple RPG set in the Pokémon universe and contained within a handheld shaped like a Poké Ball. The units come in several colors and patterns. In the game, players explore a map to find wild Pokémon and battle them. A weakened wild Pokémon can be captured and added to the party; the player may own a maximum of three Pokémon at a time. Pokémon automatically evolve upon reaching certain level thresholds. Players may challenge area bosses, which will grant access to new parts of the world upon their defeat. They may also use the device's connectivity features to battle other nearby players. Special chips, which came packaged with various Pokémon toys made by Bandai, could be inserted into the device in order to access new content.

name: Renfield: Bring Your Own Blood
description: Slash and survive a typical workday as Dracula's overworked and underappreciated servant! You'll have a bloody good time as you rampage through New Orleans to find fresh victims for your narcissistic boss.

name: Missile Command
description: A LCD handheld port of Missile Command.

name: Mickey's Stuff for Kids: Day in the Park
MGA's Pocket LCD Games: All-Pro Football
Match of the Day: Kevin Keegan's Electronic Action Soccer Game
Ultimate Super Luigi Wii: Ultimate Green Team
description:
Ultimate Super Luigi Wii is a Newer hack staring Luigi!
Get ready, only 100 seconds on the clock time to get those ultimate speed strats back into action through 40+ new levels with unique gameplay and "smashing" new graphics along with 2 new Playable Characters! This game takes place after the events of MLG Super Luigi Bros Wii.

name: Marvel Heroes: HeroesVillains
description: A handheld game where players can play as Spider-Man, Wolverine, Hulk, and Beast to defeat villains such as Dr. Doom, Venom, Juggernaut, and Mystique.

name: Marvel Heroes: Android Onslaught
description: Reactivated with a new array of deadly weapons, the android Ultron plans to conquer Earth and rid the planet of its inferior human race! Help Tony Stark, The Invincible Iron Man, defeat Ultron's legion of rogue robots with his powerful Uni-Beam, then destroy this mechanical menace once and for all!

name: Justice League: The Rescue
description: Justice League: The Rescue is a handheld electronic videogame based on the DC Comics superhero group Justice League.

name: Justice League: Save Planet Earth
description: Justice League: Save Planet Earth is a handheld electronic videogame based on the DC Comics superhero group Justice League.

name: Hulk
description: A handheld game about the superhero Hulk.

name: Football Basketball Soccer: 3 Games in One
Mass Effect 3
description: A remaster of the original Mass Effect 3 included in the Mass Effect: Legendary Edition bundle.

name: Hirata Shougo Interactive Ehon: Cinderella
description: Interactive FMV title based on the story of Cinderella.

name: Elektronika 24-01. Igra na ekrane: Mickey Mouse
DreamWorks Shrek: Multi-Game Mayhem - Featuring Shrek
description: A standalone handheld electronic device that only includes a Shrek game.

name: DreamWorks Shrek: Multi-Game Mayhem - Featuring Princess Fiona
Disney Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
Disney Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
Hirata Shougo Interactive Ehon: Ningyo Hime
description: Interactive FMV title based on the story of the Little Mermaid.

name: Hirata Shougo Interactive Ehon: Ookami to Shichi Hiki no Koyagi
description: Interactive FMV title based on the story of the Wolf and the Seven Young Goats.

name: Hirata Shougo Interactive Ehon: Sanbiki no Kobuta
description: Interactive FMV title based on the story of the Three Little Pigs.

name: Hirata Shougo Interactive Ehon: Shirayukihime
description: Interactive FMV title based on the story of Snow White.

name: Crash Bandicoot
description:
Crash Bandicoot is a licensed platform game developed and published by Tiger Electronics and published by Universal Interactive in North America, released on a handheld dedicated console in 1998. Is the cheap LCD version of Crash Bandicoot (99X).

According to George Fergan, one of the developers of Crash Bandicoot (LCD Tiger game) and Crash (99X), their small team was divided: some people wanted to make Mr. Crumb, while others wanted to make Mr. Crool. The solution came when the team decided to use both characters for two different versions of the game. Mr. Crumb would appear as the main villain in the most powerful version, Tiger 99x. While Mr. Crool would appear as the main villain in the cheap LCD version.

name: Hirata Shougo Interactive Ehon: Aesop Monogatari Vol. 1
description: Interactive FMV title based on a selection of Aesop's fables.

name: Immortal Desire
description: Sarah Jane Hamilton, Anna of Gables, is haunted by dark, erotic visions of unspeakable acts, which she struggles to understand. The one constant is a perversely beautiful voodoo ritual that appears in her dreams, and seems to hold the key to her past.

name: Sesame Street: Search & Learn Adventures
description: The Amazing Mumford tries to create a magic picnic basket to hold everything Elmo and friends need to go to the beach. He accidentally ends up teleporting all of the items across Sesame Street instead. The famous detective Sherlock Hemlock volunteers to track down the items along with your help. This is done by solving puzzles and playing educational minigames focused around shapes, matching, recycling, and more.

name: Centipede
description: MGA LCD handheld port of Centipede.

name: Pocket Player: Bubble Bobble
description: The Pocket Player has a full-color display and is fine-tuned for hours of play through its emphasis on ergonomics and compact design.

name: Batman: The Brave and the Bold
Barbie for Girls Softball
description: Barbie and her softball team are ready for the big game. It will be a tough nine innings, but, with your help, Barbie's team will win!

name: Barbie for Girls Soccer
description: Barbie and her friends take to the field in one of their favorite sports. Control Barbie's team as they try to pass and kick their way to a victory

name: Barbie for Girls Shopping Adventure
description: Can Barbie get a new outfit in time for her date with Ken? Help her avoid the crazy shoppers on her way through the mall.

name: Barbie for Girls Mountain Bike Riding
description: Barbie is ready for the big mountain bike race. On your mark, get set, GO! The race has begun! Barbie needs your help to win the race.

name: Barbie for Girls In-Line Skating
description: Barbie cruises to the beach on her cool in-line skates. Help Barbie make it to the beach before the sun goes down.

name: Barbie for Girls Horseback Riding
description: It's a beautiful day in the mountains as Barbie saddles up her horse and goes for a ride. Get ready for lots of excitement as Barbie trots along the mountain path.

name: Barbie for Girls Hearts & Stars
description: Can you turn all of Barbie's hearts into stars? Taking turns with Barbie, try to fill up the board and capture all the hearts - but don't let Barbie capture your stars.

name: Barbie for Girls Beach Adventure
description: Barbie and her dolphin friend are having a busy day at the beach. Join them as they swim through the ocean helping swimmers safely reach the shore

name: Atari Flashback Portable
description: The first edition of Atari Flashback Portable contains 60 games.

name: Gravitee Wars
description: A turn-based combat game made in Flash where players take control of feuding astronauts with an arsenal of different weapons. Players can directly shoot opposing astronauts to deplete their health points, or if shot at the right angle with an explosive, can send them flying into space or hurtling into the sun. The planets are destructible and projectiles are affected by gravity, meaning you can make shots weave around multiple planets. Players can upgrade their astronauts with more health and a longer target predictor or upgrade weapon ammo. This is the offline predecessor of Gravitee Wars Online.

name: Super Cobra
description: A port for handheld LCD device.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man Rescue
description: "The Amazing Spider-Man Rescue" is a simple portable game that is mostly based on random luck. The player presses a button, after which various lights illuminate, accumulating different points. These points need to be manually counted and added to the score wheel as Spider-Man climbs higher and higher. The game can be played with two players. The game is functionally identical to The Incredible Hulk Escapes.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man: Dodge Doc Ock
description: An LCD handheld game based on Spider-Man.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man: Skyscraper Scaler
description: An LCD handheld game based on Spider-Man.

name: The Batman: Bring on the Batman
The Incredible Hulk Escapes
description: The Incredible Hulk Escapes is a simple handheld game mostly based on random luck. The player presses a button to which different lights will light up leading to different scores. The scores need to be counted up manually and added to the score wheel while the Hulk climbs higher and higher. The game can be played with two players.

name: ExoCross
description: ExoCross is an offroad racing game introducing 4CPT vehicle physics (4-way contact patch traction technology). A soft-body tire model allows for competitive time attack and multiplayer wheel to wheel racing.
